verbose_text: On the basis of the in vitro and in vivo physiological studies, it is probable that Sr and Si ions stimulating cartilage reconstruction may activate HIF pathway and promote subchondral bone regeneration by activation of Wnt pathway, and further protect chondrocytes from OA via suppressing chondrocytes metabolic activity and increasing autophagy as well as inhibiting hedgehog pathway together.
evidence: OA via suppressing chondrocytes metabolic activity and increasing autophagy as well as inhibiting hedgehog
